short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that reminds you to take a break every 30 minutes with a fun movie-themed message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a break like a star! The "Movie Screen Break Reminder" extension reminds you to pause, stretch, and recharge every 30 minutes with lighthearted, movie-themed messages. Perfect for binge-watchers, movie enthusiasts, or anyone who could use a gentle reminder to stay active while streaming.
